Nemesis Enforcer/Scattershot:



Nemesis Enforcer slammed into the wall as bolts tore into his chest armor 
plating.  Raising his own rifle, he fired 5 rapid laser bolts at DeathStorm.

---

Scattershot slowly approached the engine room, getting ready to charge in.
